transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello Anjan ji bataiye. Ji main kaha abhi system pe hi hu sir.
Customer: Haan haan bilkul.
Executive: Sir settings pe jaiega.
Customer: Kispe?
Executive: Settings pe click kare.
Customer: Awaz break ho rahi hai aapki. Abhi aa rahi hai sir awaz? Maine kaha settings pe click kariye.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Aise bylead preferences. Kya ji? Bylead bylead preferences upar jo option hai sir last okay. Isme niche aaiye sir category. Category preference okay. Isme niche dekhiye sir kuch categories aa rahi hai jaise self loading concrete mixture ho gaya, ready mix concrete machine ho gaya, concrete mix. Ye niche product se ya nahi consumption. Consumption uske just right me hai sir based on your consumption ke base pe. Based on your product hai, based on your bylead consumption hai. Accha haan bylead consumption yahi haan isme ye dekhiye category aa rahi hai aapki self loading concrete mixture, ready mix concrete machine, concrete lifting system, concrete mix, portable mixers, hydraulic concrete mixture, universal concrete mixture and ultra tech ready mix concrete and uske baad hai last aapka concrete cutter. Isme se hum deal kis kis me kar rahe hai?
Customer: Cutter to maine hata diya cutter to hai hi nahi.
Executive: Jo aap hata rahe ho na sir usko right side me non preferred me mark bhi karte jaiega non preferred category me add kar lo sir.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Saath hi saath me ye.

And jisme hum kaam kar rahe hai usko baad me sir jab abhi mai batata hu aapko product section me jaake product add karna rahega usme.
Customer: Sure.
Executive: Hmm pehle to jo jisme nahi kar rahe hai wo aap non preferred category right side me jo hai na usme add kar lo. Same name daal ke.

Ho gaya?
Executive: Aur kitna hata diya saare hata diye?
Customer: Nahi nahi aise teen hatenge abhi.
Executive: Teen hata diye baaki add karne hai na sir hume?
Customer: Huh?
Executive: Ab baaki jo bachi hai wo hume add karna hai na sir usme?
Customer: Nahi nahi abhi to aur hata raha hu. Aur hata dijiye jo bhi matlab hatane wala hai wo hata dijiye pehle sir.

Add karne wala bata do sir please jab tak mai add kar deta hu category kaun kaun si jisme hume add karna rahega?
Customer: Yahi ek self loading concrete mixture hum kar rahe hai? Ready mix concrete machine. Ha ye bhi humara main ha main wale aati hai ye bhi. Ek second okay ye wale product me add kar deta hu. Ready mix concrete machine add kar deta hu aapka.

And sir ye self loading concrete mixture?
Customer: Self loading isko self loading isko bhi hata dijiye hata dijiye. Theek hai isko hata dijiye. Maine ready mix concrete machine add kar diya aapka.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Aur ab aur kaunsa add karna hai concrete mix ye bhi kar dunga add kya sir?
Customer: Concrete mixer lekin isme hum iske jaise edit karke iska naam change nahi ho sakta universal concrete mixer machine ho jaye. Nahi mixer machine to wo dusra hai sir fir wo alag product add karna rahega uske regarding wo same name se fir to.
Customer: Sure.
Executive: Hmm ye concrete mix alag category ho rahi hai is cheez me.

Aur ye byleads me jo leads aa rahi hai isko consume kyu nahi kar pa rahe sir? Zero balance dikha raha hai?
Executive: Aaj to aapko mil rahi hai na chaar. Chaar mil rahi hai.
Customer: Hmm hmm chaar jo humne accept kari hai haan.
Executive: Haan to wo chaar hi balance ab aapke paas 68 credit honge kal kar sakte ho.
Customer: Kal honge 68.
Executive: Hoti hai.
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Sunday ko aata hai sir 68.
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello abhi aa rahi hai sir awaz? Haan haan aa rahi hai. Sunday ko credit hota hai balance 68 ka. Sure. Haan daily weekly aapko 68 aa jaata hai. 68. 68 aur 60? 68. 68 okay. Hmm.

Aur kya karna hoga isme? Hello? Aur kya karna hoga isme? Aur ye ho gaya sir hata liya aapne saara? Haan haan hata diya. Ab ek apni sir category hai mini concrete mixture hai na? Isme humne jo product haan category ka naam hai mini concrete mixture jisme humne product aapne dala tha wo tha RD20B3 mobile concrete batching plant. Hmm hmm hmm. Hai na? Kya hum sir mini concrete mixture ke name se product add nahi kar sakte koi? Mini concrete same name se. Same name se hi. Matlab mini concrete mixture machine kar sakte hai sir. To aap ek kaam karo mini ruko mai add karke dekhta hu usko isi category me daalne ki ek second rukiega zara. Mini concrete mixture machine. Ek second rukiega. Concrete mixture machine ye to aa gaya. Accha accha accha bilkul sahi sahi sahi sahi aa gaya. 2 HP diesel. Abhi to koi nahi hai yaar. Matlab wo bhi order complete hamara area hua tha. To wo keh rahe hai ji do mahine bad le jaega automatic. Sahi hai theek hai. Ye ho gaya aapka correct. Ye mapping iski ho gayi ye ho gaya ye B rank. Ek sir apni ek aur category hai sir storage silo karke. Haan storage silo. Silo sorry isme aapne mild steel silo dala hai. Kya hum storage silo ke name se hi daal sakte hai koi product? Haan sir ek storage silo ye mild mild to pata nahi kaha se aa gaya mild steel ki hai tabhi sir usme leads nahi aa rahi hai aapke paas iske regarding. Isme hum bhi. Mai product add kar de raha hu sir pricing ek baar aap check kar lijiyega. Random maine wo sir uski specification add kari ek baar check karke correct kar lijiyega aap. Haan ye products me jaake na? Haan maine abhi just product add kar diye hai aapne ye storage silo bhi ho gaya ye ho gaya. Ab ek cheez aur hai sir aapko na jab bhi kisi buyer se aap baat karte ho. Theek hai sir to aap rating reviews ke liye jarur baat kara kariye sir unse reviews lijiye. Acchi abhi hamara haan 4.2 ki rating hai theek hai thoda sa aur badhega to jyada better rahega. Aur plus jo lead kaam ki nahi hai sir usko not relevant mark karna sir specific category section me jaake jaise I don't know dealing this product ho gaya ya fir less order value ka ho gaya is tarike se. Theek hai sir baaki ye maine saare add kar diye ye saara hat gaya isme aur bhi cheeze hongi mai ek baar check kar leta hu aur mai aapko fir isme batata hu dekhte hai sir isme is week me aapka lead kaisa rehta hai is baar. Theek theek hai bilkul theek hai baaki koi aur issue lagta hai to please mujhe bataiyega sir ek baar. Haan haan bilkul theek hai. Theek hai sir okay thank you. Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer unable to consume buyleads, zero balance.

- Wants to know if product name can be edited.

- Enquires about leads in byleads.



Resolution:

- Executive added ready mix concrete machine.

- Executive added storage silo.

- Executive explained about rating reviews.

- Executive explained about marking leads as not relevant.

- Executive informed about 68 credits on Sunday.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to check pricing and specifications.

- Executive will check for more things.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, product, category, rating
